languages.text: Служка: "Пальцы-ы-ы... Мои пальцы!" Блюститель: "Я буду ломать по одному за каждое лживое слово. А теперь говори!" Служка: "П-прошу, поверьте! Мы всего лишь подготовили холст и смешали краски с кровью Леди-Навигатора! Затем нам приказали зафиксировать ставни, дабы Лорд-капитан мог{mf||ла} видеть происходящее в Санктум Навис из палат созерцателей и..."

traits.locale_text: Служка: Пальцы-ы-ы... Мои пальцы! Блюститель: Я буду ломать по одному за каждое лживое слово. А теперь говори! Служка: П-прошу, поверьте! Мы всего лишь подготовили холст и смешали краски с кровью Леди-Навигатора! Затем нам приказали зафиксировать ставни, дабы Лорд-капитан мог{mf||ла} видеть происходящее в Санктум Навис из палат созерцателей и...

languages.text: Servant: "No, please! Not the fingers!" Enforcer: "I'm gonna break one for every word of a lie I hear coming from your mouth. Now talk!" Servant: "P-please, you have to believe me! All we did was prepare the canvas and mix the Lady Navigator's blood into the paints! Then we were told to lock open the shutters so that the Lord Captain could see everything that was going on inside the Sanctum Navis from the observation chambers, and—"
languages.original_text: Служка: "Пальцы-ы-ы... Мои пальцы!" Блюститель: "Я буду ломать по одному за каждое лживое слово. А теперь говори!" Служка: "П-прошу, поверьте! Мы всего лишь подготовили холст и смешали краски с кровью Леди-Навигатора! Затем нам приказали зафиксировать ставни, дабы Лорд-капитан мог{mf||ла} видеть происходящее в Санктум Навис из палат созерцателей и..."

languages.text: 従者：「お願い、やめてくれ！指だけは！」 エンフォーサー：「お前の口から嘘を1つ聞く度に、指を1本折る。さあ、話せ！」 従者：「ど、どうか、信じて！みんな確かに画布の準備をしましたし、航宙士様の血を絵の具にしました！それからロード・キャプテンがサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスの内部で起きていることを屋外観察室から見られるよう、シャッターを開けたまま固定するよう言われたんです。それに…」
languages.original_text: Servant: "No, please! Not the fingers!" Enforcer: "I'm gonna break one for every word of a lie I hear coming from your mouth. Now talk!" Servant: "P-please, you have to believe me! All we did was prepare the canvas and mix the Lady Navigator's blood into the paints! Then we were told to lock open the shutters so that the Lord Captain could see everything that was going on inside the Sanctum Navis from the observation chambers, and—"

traits.locale_text: 従者：「お願い、やめてくれ！指だけは！」 エンフォーサー：「お前の口から嘘を1つ聞く度に、指を1本折る。さあ、話せ！」 従者：「ど、どうか、信じて！みんな確かに画布の準備をしましたし、航宙士様の血を絵の具にしました！それからロード・キャプテンがサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスの内部で起きていることを屋外観察室から見られるよう、シャッターを開けたまま固定するよう言われたんです。それに…」

languages.text: 仆人：“不，求你了！别折断我的手指！” 执法者：“你每说一句谎，我就折断你一根手指！老实交代！” 仆人：“求——求求你了，我说的是实话！我们只是准备了一张画布，把导航者女士的鲜血混进颜料里！之后导航者女士说要把门锁上，把百叶窗打开，这样舰长大人就可以从观察室里看到导航者圣所的实际情况。然后——”
languages.original_text: Servant: "No, please! Not the fingers!" Enforcer: "I'm gonna break one for every word of a lie I hear coming from your mouth. Now talk!" Servant: "P-please, you have to believe me! All we did was prepare the canvas and mix the Lady Navigator's blood into the paints! Then we were told to lock open the shutters so that the Lord Captain could see everything that was going on inside the Sanctum Navis from the observation chambers, and—"

traits.locale_text: 仆人：“不，住手！别折断我的手指！” 执法者：“你每说一句谎，我就折断你一根手指！老实交代！” 仆人：“求——求求你了，我说的是实话！我们只是准备了一张画布，把导航者女士的鲜血混进颜料里！之后导航者女士说要把门锁上，把百叶窗打开，这样舰长大人就可以从观察室里看到导航者圣所的实际情况。然后——”

languages.text: Serviteur : « Non, pitié ! Pas les doigts ! » Prévôt : « J'en briserai un chaque fois que vous me mentirez. Alors, parlez ! » Serviteur : « Je... je vous en supplie, vous devez me croire ! Tout ce qu'on a fait, c'est préparer la toile et mélanger le sang de la dame navigatrice à la peinture ! Après, on nous a dit d'ouvrir les obturateurs pour que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} puisse voir tout ce qui se passait dans le sanctum navis depuis l'observatoire, et... »
languages.original_text: Servant: "No, please! Not the fingers!" Enforcer: "I'm gonna break one for every word of a lie I hear coming from your mouth. Now talk!" Servant: "P-please, you have to believe me! All we did was prepare the canvas and mix the Lady Navigator's blood into the paints! Then we were told to lock open the shutters so that the Lord Captain could see everything that was going on inside the Sanctum Navis from the observation chambers, and—"

traits.locale_text: Serviteur : « Non, pitié ! Pas les doigts ! » Prévôt : « J'en briserai un chaque fois que vous me mentirez. Alors, parlez ! » Serviteur : « Je... je vous en supplie, vous devez me croire ! Tout ce qu'on a fait, c'est préparer la toile et mélanger le sang de la dame navigatrice à la peinture ! Après, on nous a dit d'ouvrir les obturateurs pour que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} puisse voir tout ce qui se passait dans le sanctum navis depuis l'observatoire, et... »

languages.text: Sirviente: «¡No, por favor! ¡Los dedos no!». Guardia:«Te romperé uno por cada embuste que oiga salir de tu boca. ¡Y ahora, habla!». Sirviente:«¡P-por favor, créame que le digo la verdad! ¡Lo único que hicimos fue preparar el lienzo y mezclar la sangre de la lady Navegante con la pintura! Luego nos dijeron que dejásemos abiertas las persianas para que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pudiera ver todo lo que ocurría dentro del Sanctum Navis desde las cámaras de observación, y...».
languages.original_text: Servant: "No, please! Not the fingers!" Enforcer: "I'm gonna break one for every word of a lie I hear coming from your mouth. Now talk!" Servant: "P-please, you have to believe me! All we did was prepare the canvas and mix the Lady Navigator's blood into the paints! Then we were told to lock open the shutters so that the Lord Captain could see everything that was going on inside the Sanctum Navis from the observation chambers, and—"

traits.locale_text: Sirviente: «¡No, por favor! ¡Los dedos no!». Guardia: «Te romperé uno por cada embuste que oiga salir de tu boca. ¡Y ahora, habla!». Sirviente: «¡P-por favor, créame que le digo la verdad! ¡Lo único que hicimos fue preparar el lienzo y mezclar la sangre de la lady Navegante con la pintura! Luego nos dijeron que dejásemos abiertas las persianas para que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pudiera ver todo lo que ocurría dentro del Sanctum Navis desde las cámaras de observación, y...».

languages.text: Servant: "Nein, bitte! Nicht die Finger!" Enforcer: "Für jedes gelogene Wort aus Eurem Mund breche ich Euch einen Finger. Und jetzt redet!" Servant: "B-Bitte, Ihr müsst mir glauben! Wir haben nur die Leinwand vorbereitet und das Blut der Lady Navigator in die Farben gemischt! Dann hat man uns gesagt, wir sollen die Jalousien öffnen, damit der Lord Captain vom Beobachtungsraum aus alles sehen kann, was im Sanctum Navis vor sich geht, und -"
languages.original_text: Servant: "No, please! Not the fingers!" Enforcer: "I'm gonna break one for every word of a lie I hear coming from your mouth. Now talk!" Servant: "P-please, you have to believe me! All we did was prepare the canvas and mix the Lady Navigator's blood into the paints! Then we were told to lock open the shutters so that the Lord Captain could see everything that was going on inside the Sanctum Navis from the observation chambers, and—"

traits.locale_text: Servant: "Nein, bitte! Nicht die Finger!" Enforcer: "Für jedes gelogene Wort aus Eurem Mund breche ich Euch einen Finger. Und jetzt redet!" Servant: "B-Bitte, Ihr müsst mir glauben! Wir haben nur die Leinwand vorbereitet und das Blut der Lady Navigator in die Farben gemischt! Dann hat man uns gesagt, wir sollen die Jalousien öffnen, damit der Lord Captain vom Beobachtungsraum aus alles sehen kann, was im Sanctum Navis vor sich geht, und -"

languages.text: Hizmetkâr: "N'olur yapmayın! Parmaklarıma dokunmayın!" İnfazcı: "Hele ağzından tek bir yalan çıksın, bak bakalım parmaklarını teker teker kırıyor muyum kırmıyor muyum! Anlat hemen!" Hizmetkâr: "N'olur inanın bana! Yalnız tuvali hazırlayıp boyalara Leydi Rotacı'nın kanını kattık, o kadar! Sonra Lord Kaptan gözlem odasından Navis Kutağı'nda olan biteni görebilsin diye kepenkleri açık tutmamızı söylediler, sonra da..."
languages.original_text: Servant: "No, please! Not the fingers!" Enforcer: "I'm gonna break one for every word of a lie I hear coming from your mouth. Now talk!" Servant: "P-please, you have to believe me! All we did was prepare the canvas and mix the Lady Navigator's blood into the paints! Then we were told to lock open the shutters so that the Lord Captain could see everything that was going on inside the Sanctum Navis from the observation chambers, and—"

traits.locale_text: Hizmetkâr: "N'olur yapmayın! Parmaklarıma dokunmayın!" İnfazcı: "Hele ağzından tek bir yalan çıksın, bak bakalım parmaklarını teker teker kırıyor muyum kırmıyor muyum! Anlat hemen!" Hizmetkâr: "Lütfen inanın bana! Sadece tuvali hazırlayıp boyalara Leydi Rotacı'nın kanını kattık, o kadar! Sonra Lord Kaptan gözlem odasından Navis Kutağı'nda olan biteni görebilsin diye kepenkleri açık tutmamızı söylediler, sonra da..."
